descriptionHtml:
[youtube]MNaS8dmvsZU[/youtube]
WhirlWind V1.1

[youtube]BYtwwY8Bd04[/youtube]
WhirlWind V1.0

SKSE 1.7.0 or Higher Version.
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]

-Powers
-Auto learn
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 20% * 0.05 Skyrim Delay (4 Second)(24Area)
-Requre : Magicka 4 per 1 Hit
-Spiral Slash : WhirlWind(During) > Right Attack/Left Attack/Block

::Edit Console Command::
` > Set WhirlWindDamageRate to 1.0    //default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)
` > Set WhirlWindDamageDelay to 0.05 //default value Skyrim delay time 0.0.5
` > Set WhirlWindMagicka to 4.0           //default value Magicka 4.0

PS.WhirlWind Animation using tg05_stabplayer.HKX

::CREDIT::
WhirlWind Animation : Gomachaum
Special Thanks : Xp32, evanoblivion




[youtube]7Yzy1wUFgt8[/youtube]
DarkFallingGrave

-Powers
-Auto learn
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 25% * 8Hit (24Area)
-Requre : Magicka : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value *2.0

::Edit Console Command::
` > Set fallDamageRate to 1.0      //default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)
` > Set fallRequireMagicka to 2.0 //default value Magicka 2.0 (2.0=200%)
` > Set fallCombo to 8                 //default value 8 (8=8Hit)




[youtube]kRsPesar16E[/youtube]
Destruction

-Powers
-Auto learn
-Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 40% * 15Hit (24Area)
-Requre : Stamina 75%

::Edit Console Command::
` > Set desDamageRate to 1.0               //default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)
` > Set TempestRequireStamina to 0.75 //default value Magicka 0.75 (0.75=75%)





*Feel free to use everything in this file.
author: elysees with gomachaum
